name: SpeechSynthesis.voiceschanged
description: The voiceschanged event of the Web Speech API is fired when the list of SpeechSynthesisVoice objects that would be returned by the SpeechSynthesis.getVoices() method has changed (when the voiceschanged event fires.)
content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The voiceschanged event of the Web Speech API is fired when the list of SpeechSynthesisVoice objects that would be returned by the SpeechSynthesis.getVoices() method has changed (when the voiceschanged event fires.)

Bubbles No
Cancelable No
Interface Event
Event handler property onvoiceschanged
